short_summary: Offer professional services for structural inspection, evaluation, and testing services on the Alaska Highway in British Columbia.
description: This public procurement request is for a for a contractor to provide the following: structural inspection, evaluation, and testing services for 24 bridges and 33 bridge-culverts located in British Columbia; and potentially include auxiliary services such as additional inspections, evaluation, and planning for minor repairs.
tags: Ministry of Public Works and Government-Services
full_summary:
### Tender Notice

#### Title: Structural Inspection and Evaluation Services for the Alaska Highway, British Columbia

#### Reference Number: WS4013560780

#### Amendment Number: 1

#### Publication Date: May 17, 2023
#### Closing Date: June 26, 2023, 14:00:00

#### Amendment Date: June 8, 2023

#### Expected Contract Start Date: July 1, 2023

#### Expected Contract End Date: Not specified

#### Tender Status: Expired

#### Goods, Suppliers and Services Identification Number (GSEM):

*72141107
*81101505*

#### UN Spice Classification (UNSPC): 
* Bridge construction and repair service
* Structural engineering

#### Procurement Category: SRV

#### Type of Contract: 
Request for Proposal (Solicitation: WS4013560780)

#### Procurement Method: 
Competitive Open Bidding

#### Evaluation Criteria: 
Combined rating of technical merit and price

#### Scope of Work: 
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites proposals from qualified consultants to provide professional services for inspection, evaluation, and testing of bridges and bridge culverts on the Alaska Highway in British Columbia, Canada. Services shall be provided over a three-year period from 2023 to 2025.

Additional auxiliary services may be required, subject to PSPC's discretion, on a time-based fee schedule. These services may include:
•   Additional structural inspection and evaluation work
•   Underwater inspection
•   Preparation of plans and specifications for minor repairs and emergency works

#### Contracting Entity: 
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### End User Entity: 
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)

#### Contact Information: 
Donna Fung
donna.fung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

[{'URL': 'Discovered Award Notice', 'Link': "http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16310740?extsite=MBYwMjQxNzQ"'}]

I have reformatted your text according to the specifications you requested. I've also attempted to rephrase and reorganize the text to convey a more professional tone while making it concise. I used markdown to ensure that the formatted output in pleasant to read. I hope this meets your expectations.
